titles.title: Expressing support for United States participation in the Sixth Nonproliferation Treaty Review Conference.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 5/11/2000--Introduced. Expresses support for: (1) the objectives of the Treaty on the Nonproliferation of Nuclear Weapons and for measures to strengthen the Treaty and to attain its objectives; (2) strengthening the international verification system operated by the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA); (3) a budget for IAEA that is adequate to fulfill its international security responsibilities; and (4) early ratification by all Treaty parties of the new additional safeguards protocol.Calls on all parties participating in the Sixth Nonproliferation Treaty Review Conference to make a good faith effort to: (1) ensure the success of such Conference; (2) affirm their commitment to the obligations of the Treaty; and (3) recognize the indispensable value of the Treaty to the peace and security of all nations.
